name: Barata (Filipe Veiga)
description:
As a quality engineer for the Tabajara Organizations, your mission is to test the new COCKROACH TERMINATOR-900 drone on those pesky insects that crawl across your lab floor! The drone is equipped with bombs that can only be dropped one at a time! 

Exterminate the cockroaches!

This game was created for a programming article about Boriel's ZX Basic Compiler, published in issue 20 of Revista Jogos 80, a Brazilian magazine about retro-gaming.

You can download the emulator .tap file. The source code is also available.

Controls: o - Left   /   p - Right   /   m - Drop bomb
